amendment.description: Amendment sought to decrease funding for State and Private Forestry by $20,860,800 and to apply the savings to the spending reduction account.
amendment.purpose: An amendment to decrease FS State and Private Forestry by $20.8 million.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A040) Failed by voice vote.

action.text: Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Broun (GA) amendment (A040) Failed by voice vote.
House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A040) offered by Mr. Broun (GA).
